display.title: Poison Eater Jewel
display.description: Combine a Runecarver's Jewel in an Experience Infuser with a stack of Poisonous Potatoes, Rotten Flesh & Spider Eyes [Required: 1x Any Runecarver's Jewel 64x Poisonous Potato 64x Rotten Flesh 64x Spider Eye | Drop Craft With: Experience Infuser]
